His impressive batting performance, scoring 754 runs, coupled with his focus on team dynamics, eased the transition from the Rohit Sharma era.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/shubman-gills-baptism-by-bazball-calm-head-bat-full-of-runs-and-a-gun-team/articleshow/123108839.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/shubman-gills-baptism-by-bazball-calm-head-bat-full-of-runs-and-a-gun-team/articleshow/123108839.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 09:36:49 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>SAHIL MALHOTRA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="65358" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123109248,imgsize-65358.cms"/></item><item><title>J&K statehood to be restored? This principle fueled her journey from a speech contest loss to leading a global consulting firm. Sweet emphasizes adaptability, echoing Jamie Dimon and Satya Nadella, as crucial for sustained growth and relevance in today's dynamic business landscape.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/accenture-ceo-julie-sweet-shares-career-advice-she-got-from-her-father-at-15-youre-never-going-to/articleshow/123094743.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/accenture-ceo-julie-sweet-shares-career-advice-she-got-from-her-father-at-15-youre-never-going-to/articleshow/123094743.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 04 Aug 2025 16:49:10 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="19740" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123094734,imgsize-19740.cms"/></item><item><title>How Ukrainian soldier dodged death and mines on e-bike flown in by drone - video</title><description><![CDATA[In a daring rescue, a wounded Ukrainian soldier, call sign "Tanker," was saved after being stranded in enemy territory near Siversk. Amidst this, Kyiv faced renewed missile strikes, prompting President Zelensky to urge allies for action against Russia.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/europe/behind-enemy-lines-how-ukrainian-soldier-dodged-death-and-mines-on-e-bike-flown-in-by-drone-watch-video/articleshow/123108988.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/europe/behind-enemy-lines-how-ukrainian-soldier-dodged-death-and-mines-on-e-bike-flown-in-by-drone-watch-video/articleshow/123108988.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 09:39:55 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="4209762" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123109210,imgsize-4209762.cms"/></item><item><title>Latest WTC Points Table: India climb to third , England slide</title><description><![CDATA[India, who were fourth before the Oval Test, have moved up to third in the WTC standings, swapping places with England, who dropped to fourth after suffering their second defeat of the cycle. Although both teams have identical records, two wins, two losses, and one draw, England lost two crucial points due to a slow over rate in the Lord’s Test, giving India the edge.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/latest-wtc-points-table-india-climb-to-third-after-winning-at-the-oval-england-slide/articleshow/123109224.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/latest-wtc-points-table-india-climb-to-third-after-winning-at-the-oval-england-slide/articleshow/123109224.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 09:48:42 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="87092" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123109359,imgsize-87092.cms"/></item><item><title>Stock market today: Nifty opens below 24,700; Sensex down over 150 points</title><description><![CDATA[Stock market today: Nifty50 and BSE Sensex, the Indian equity benchmark indices, opened in red on Monday. The company states the changes reflect 2024 contributions and aim for maximum impact on pro-innovation policies, amidst a broader retreat from DEI commitments.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/google-stops-funding-of-214-groups-over-50-of-them-related-to-diversity-and-equity-report/articleshow/123073327.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/google-stops-funding-of-214-groups-over-50-of-them-related-to-diversity-and-equity-report/articleshow/123073327.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 03 Aug 2025 12:55:16 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="38810" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123073319,imgsize-38810.cms"/></item><item><title>'Decision made': Israel to take full control of the Gaza Strip?</title><description><![CDATA[Amid stalled ceasefire talks, Israel is reportedly considering a plan to fully occupy the Gaza Strip, potentially escalating its conflict with Hamas. This shift follows a breakdown in hostage negotiations and growing frustration over Hamas's control.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/middle-east/decision-made-israel-to-take-full-control-of-the-gaza-strip-idf-may-enter-hostage-held-areas/articleshow/123107663.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/middle-east/decision-made-israel-to-take-full-control-of-the-gaza-strip-idf-may-enter-hostage-held-areas/articleshow/123107663.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 08:00:23 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="761366" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123107704,imgsize-761366.cms"/></item><item><title>IND vs ENG | 'I only believe in S...' – Google salutes Siraj's heroics at Oval</title><description><![CDATA[Mohammed Siraj's sensational five-wicket haul propelled India to a thrilling six-run victory over England at The Oval, leveling the Anderson-Tendulkar Trophy 2-2. Google India celebrated Siraj's heroics with a clever tribute referencing his viral quote about Jasprit Bumrah.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/i-only-believe-in-s-google-salutes-mohammed-sirajs-heroics-at-the-oval/articleshow/123109010.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/i-only-believe-in-s-google-salutes-mohammed-sirajs-heroics-at-the-oval/articleshow/123109010.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 09:26:52 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="36572" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123109064,imgsize-36572.cms"/></item><item><title>'Toughest days of my life': Hemant Soren pens emotional note after father's death</title><description><![CDATA[Jharkhand CM Hemant Soren penned a heartfelt tribute to his father, Shibu Soren, following the JMM founder's death at 81. He vowed to continue his father's struggle for tribal empowerment, honoring his legacy of unwavering dedication and sacrifice.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/toughest-days-of-my-life-hemant-soren-pens-emotional-note-after-father-shibu-sorens-death-recalls-why-he-was-called-dishom-guru/articleshow/123107733.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/toughest-days-of-my-life-hemant-soren-pens-emotional-note-after-father-shibu-sorens-death-recalls-why-he-was-called-dishom-guru/articleshow/123107733.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 07:52:31 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="121706" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123108433,imgsize-121706.cms"/></item><item><title>Apple CEO Tim Cook confirms: Majority of new iPhones sold in the US are 'made' in India</title><description><![CDATA[Apple CEO Tim Cook stated that most iPhones sold in the US during the last quarter were made in India, despite Donald Trump's criticism of this manufacturing shift. India has become the main hub for iPhone production for the US market, while China focuses on non-US regions. Apple is experiencing record revenue growth in India, driven by strong iPhone sales.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/apple-ceo-tim-cook-confirms-majority-of-new-iphones-sold-in-the-us-are-made-in-india-while-vietnam-is-the-location-for-/articleshow/123071759.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/apple-ceo-tim-cook-confirms-majority-of-new-iphones-sold-in-the-us-are-made-in-india-while-vietnam-is-the-location-for-/articleshow/123071759.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 03 Aug 2025 09:51:57 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="36252" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123071756,imgsize-36252.cms"/></item><item><title>Salaries of Bengaluru players, including Chhetri, suspended; club issues statement</title><description><![CDATA[Bengaluru FC have suspended salaries for its first-team players and staff, including Sunil Chhetri, due to uncertainty surrounding the Indian Super League's future. This decision follows unresolved issues between FSDL and AIFF, impacting the league's continuation. The club emphasises its commitment to youth development while urging a swift resolution to the impasse for the sake of Indian football.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/football/top-stories/salaries-of-bengaluru-players-including-sunil-chhetri-suspended-indefinitely-club-issues-statement-amid-isl-uncertainty/articleshow/123108694.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/football/top-stories/salaries-of-bengaluru-players-including-sunil-chhetri-suspended-indefinitely-club-issues-statement-amid-isl-uncertainty/articleshow/123108694.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 09:00:10 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="162404" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123108711,imgsize-162404.cms"/></item><item><title>Venus Williams addresses plastic surgery stance: Emphasizes comfort with her natural look</title><description><![CDATA[Venus Williams, the tennis star, recently shared her perspective on cosmetic surgery, emphasizing personal empowerment over societal expectations. After overcoming health challenges, including fibroid surgery, she made a comeback to professional tennis with the support of her fiancé, Andrea Preti.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/international-sports/serena-williams-sister-venus-williams-has-one-unavoidable-condition-for-considering-for-getting-plastic-surgery/articleshow/123109028.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/international-sports/serena-williams-sister-venus-williams-has-one-unavoidable-condition-for-considering-for-getting-plastic-surgery/articleshow/123109028.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 09:28:28 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="78716" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123109044,imgsize-78716.cms"/></item><item><title>Ram Rahim free again: Dera chief given 40-day parole; to return to prison mid-September</title><description><![CDATA[Gurmeet Ram Rahim, the head of Dera Sacha Sauda, has been released on a 40-day parole. His release has sparked discussions, considering his past conviction.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/chandigarh/rape-convict-dera-sacha-sauda-chief-gurmeet-ram-rahim-gets-40-day-parole-will-return-to-jail-mid-september/articleshow/123108360.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/chandigarh/rape-convict-dera-sacha-sauda-chief-gurmeet-ram-rahim-gets-40-day-parole-will-return-to-jail-mid-september/articleshow/123108360.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 08:46:36 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>AJAY SURA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="53664" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123108485,imgsize-53664.cms"/></item><item><title>IND vs ENG: 'Do you think the jawans complain about the cold?' - Gavaskar</title><description><![CDATA[Sunil Gavaskar slammed the growing trend of workload management, urging players to show the same commitment as soldiers guarding the borders. Unsafe excavation practices are causing landslides and spring depletion. Residents report cracks in houses and declining crop yields. The National Green Tribunal has directed a seismic study. The High Court has stayed mining activity and ordered inspections.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/dehradun/bageshwar-mining-poses-grave-danger-govt-panel-says-in-alarming-report/articleshow/123098878.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/dehradun/bageshwar-mining-poses-grave-danger-govt-panel-says-in-alarming-report/articleshow/123098878.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 04 Aug 2025 20:28:51 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>PANKUL SHARMA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="75926" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123105049,imgsize-75926.cms"/></item><item><title>Watch: Gambhir and India coaches go wild after win at The Oval</title><description><![CDATA[Gautam Gambhir's passionate celebrations highlighted India's dramatic six-run victory over England at The Oval, securing a 2-2 series draw.       <description><![CDATA[The Genius Act marks a turning point for stablecoins, offering them legal legitimacy and regulatory clarity. “This legitimisation of stablecoins is certainly going to give a huge boost,” says Eswar Prasad, Professor at Cornell University.       <description><![CDATA[SuperK plans to use its ₹100 crore Series B funding to deepen its presence in Andhra Pradesh, Telangana, and Karnataka, rather than expanding nationwide. “We’re not trying to expand everywhere… the market we’re operating in already has immense depth,” said Neeraj Menta, Co-Founder of SuperK.     <item>
      <title><![CDATA[No interim US-India trade deal yet; Indian exporters brace for 20-25% tariffs as August 1 deadline nears]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/world/india-us-trade-deal-delay-trump-tariffs-impact-exporters-19644819.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Indian exporters are gearing up for possible US tariffs of 20–25% as the August 1 deadline set by President Trump approaches without an interim trade deal. While the tariff uncertainty has stalled orders, industry leaders say Indian exporters remain competitively placed compared to rivals like Bangladesh and China. Exporters expect the tariffs to impact profit margins more than supply chains, with fresh orders likely once clarity emerges post-deadline. Trade talks are set to resume in August as both countries work toward a broader agreement.]]></description>
      <pubDate><![CDATA[Mon, 28 Jul 2025 23:11:22 +0530]]></pubDate>

    </item>

      <description><![CDATA[India’s electric vehicle (EV) revolution is accelerating, fueled by the recent India–UK free trade agreement (FTA) and Tesla’s entry into the market, says industry veteran Pawan Goenka.
